segments.text: I can't believe how risky it is for the boy to be on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he could just topple backwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman is completely oblivious!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl looking up at him, her face lighting up with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's kind of sweet, but also reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, waiting for a cookie as if it's a prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, every moment I glance at her, I think about the potential disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
